name: Arcs (itch)
description:
Arcs!

A little puzzle game I made real quick, seeing how quickly I could move from concept to prototype (and make something that works on a phone?).

Maybe someday I'll expand on the idea (friendlier 'flying' mechanics + hazards to avoid, level progress, characterization, etc.?), but for now it's... this little thing!

Rules!

• A ball 'dies' when it leaves the field of play, which will happen inevitably.

• One ball begins in play.

• If zero balls are in play, you lose.

• Click/tap the screen to spawn a second ball.

• If you try to spawn a new ball when two are already in play, you lose.

• For each successful spawn, you receive 1 point.

• There is a sound for a successful spawn and a sound for a ball death.

New balls will spawn in the opposite direction the first ball was traveling, but there's a variance of 140 degrees it could possibly take (randomly chosen) on its new arc.

Good luck! My high score is 32 so far.
